title: Victoria Surf Coast Winery Escape with Daily Breakfast Hamper & Room Upgrade
description: Experience the allure of Victoria's Surf Coast with a luxurious stay at Mt Duneed Estate, a boutique sanctuary nestled amidst verdant vineyards. This chic retreat, situated just outside Geelong and a little over an hour from Melbourne, offers secluded, contemporary accommodation designed for indulgence. Immerse yourself in a lavish bath, complemented by local organic products from The Herbalist, while savouring the picturesque vineyard vistas from your private terrace. Venture out to explore the estate's enchanting grounds, meander through the vine rows, enjoy a refreshing drink at seasonal The Garden Bar, or delight in the culinary masterpieces at the onsite Barrel Hall Restaurant.
offer_address: 65 Pettavel Road, Waurn Ponds, Victoria 3216, Australia

title: Victoria Surf Coast Winery Escape with Cellar Door Credit & Daily Breakfast Hamper
description:
Experience the allure of Victoria's Surf Coast during a stay at Mt Duneed Estate, a boutique sanctuary nestled amid the vines. This chic retreat, situated just outside Geelong and a little over one hour from Melbourne, offers secluded, contemporary accommodation designed for indulgence and relaxation.

Immerse yourself in picturesque vineyard vistas from your private terrace. Venture out onto the estate's grounds, meandering through the vine rows and enjoying a refreshing drink at the Cellar Door or Garden Bar (open seasonally), or delight in the culinary masterpieces at the Barrel Hall.
offer_address: 65 Pettavel Road, Waurn Ponds, Victoria 3216, Australia

title: Victoria Surf Coast Winery Escape with Cellar Door & Restaurant
description: Discover the beauty of Victoria's Surf Coast with a stay at Mt Duneed Estate, a boutique retreat among the vineyards. This elegant property offers a unique blend of coastal serenity and winery charm, with an onsite cellar door and restaurant. Indulge in locally sourced dishes paired with estate-grown wines at The Barrel Hall Restaurant, enjoy a drink in the sunshine at The Garden Bar or explore the nearby Great Ocean Road and its stunning beaches.
offer_address: 65 Pettavel Road, Waurn Ponds, Victoria 3216, Australia
